name: Spellbound: The Magic Within
description:
Spellbound: The Magic Within is a branching narrative, multiple ending , interactive visual novel. Jump into a world of Magic, Witchcraft and Mystery as the town of Witcherley's newest resident. After discovering you have an abundance of magical energy your family send you to learn how to harness that power with an old family friend. You swiftly find yourself relocating to the charming village of Witcherley where you will interact with a host of unusual characters. Choose from multiple schools of magic, bond with your tutor, and maybe even save the world.

Your choices will impact the way characters interact with you, how your magic develops and ultimately the ending you receive.

Where will your powers take you? Who can be trusted in this village? And what's going on in the forest?

The choices are yours but are you ready for the consequences. Will you be strong enough when the time comes?

Meet the Tutors:


Features:
  • Customisable player portrait - Create your Witchsona
  • Choose your Pronouns
  • Choose your school of Magic
  • Befriend or Romance your preferred Character
  • Roleplay style choices that affect the outcome of your story - Can you save the day?
  • Multiple endings per each character - platonic and romantic options available.


Spellbound: The Magic Within is still in production which means you can have an actual say in how the game is shaping up. We have a discord where we show sneak peeks, behind the scenes developer stuff, and most importantly talk to you!
